name: seasonably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is expected at or suitable for a particular time of the year: Expect some seasonably chilly weather in the mountains in the late autumn. The seasonably adjusted unemployment rate increased last month.
More examplesFewer examplesThe weather tonight will be clear and seasonably cold.Sunny and seasonably warm conditions are expected here today.You could use roasted vegetables to make this salad seasonably in the winter months.The restaurant's menu is based on what is seasonably available.
